value:
$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Ha-hah-hah!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|We've come for you, Surtr!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Welcome to my hall, whelp! That you
struggled so hard to get here proves
that you long to be burned to ash.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You'll pay for what you've done, Surtr!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Laugh while you can! You will soon
be punished for your sins. You will
die, with nothing left but regret!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Oh, child of ice... Your words may be
strong, but you are not. I am too
powerful... What hope do you have?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|It is not my hope. It is OUR hope.$k$pThe full might of Nifl is behind me. My
mother and my sister, murdered by
your hand, lent me their power!$k$pThe full might of Askr is also with
me. By my side are those who have
pledged to aid me!$k$pIt is time! $Nu!
Use your divine weapon!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|What... What is this—$k$pThe power of Nifl...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Surtr's flames, they're—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|They're disappearing!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Cool|This is what we've waited for!
Múspellflame—that unquenchable,
undying fire—no longer protects him!$k$pThe battle we have waited for...for so
very long... It begins now!$k$pSurtr... Your time has come!$k$p

$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Grrraaaaaagh!$k$pHrrgh... Agh...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The flames are consuming him!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|We've done it! Surtr is destroyed!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Victory is ours! Oh, I'm overjoyed...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Mother... Sister...$k$pAre you watching? Finally, we—$k$p$WmMPID_スルト名前,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Grr... Rrgh...$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo1000,255,0,0,255|$Fi1000|Heh-heh-heh...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What?$k$p$WmMPID_スルト名前,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Heh-heh-hah!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo1000,255,0,0,255|$Fi1000|Ha-hah-hah-hah-hah!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo2500,255,0,0,255|$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|$Fi2500|Like the phoenix...I am born anew!
Never have I awakened so
refreshed...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But... How?$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|My wounds are gone. Care to begin
again?$k$p$EFace_Smile|Try as many times as you wish! I will
always come back...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I...don't...understand...$k$pHow is Surtr still alive?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It makes no sense!$k$pThe Rite of Frost is the means to
defeat him...$k$pIt's our only option... We risked
everything! We lost so much...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|I pity you, child of ice. I pity you for
your weakness...$k$pYou struggled so hard, not knowing
how powerless you truly were.$k$pThis childish trick of yours... It was
in vain, as was your sister's sacrifice.$k$pAll you strove for... A total waste.$k$p$EFace_Smile|The shade of your sister, so pitiful
and weak... Does she cry out in
regret?$k$pCan you hear her wailing?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No, no, no... *sob*$k$pI can't accept this...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Ah, there it is! As your final moments
approach, all that remains is despair.
That is what I wanted to see!$k$pYou will die with that look on your
face. I will burn each of you to cinders
myself!$k$pWho's first?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Retreat! Now! Run!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Hah-hah-hah! I am flame itself! Even
the gods cannot destroy me!$k$pGwa-hah-hah-hah-hah!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|What's wrong?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|I've just received word from Loki. The
Askran army failed to defeat Father.
They've retreated.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Askr... Nifl... Wasting their time.$k$pNo one can defeat Father.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|I wouldn't underestimate the Askrans.
If it wasn't for the Rite of Flames, they
would have destroyed him.$k$pOf the many who have tried...none
have come so close.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|True...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|I wonder if Princess Fjorm survived
the battle...$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Laegjarn?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|No, it matters not. We need to focus
on our mission. What's the latest
report on Prince Hríd?$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Escaped. Again. The soldiers couldn't
catch him. Even though he's wounded.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|I am not surprised that the eldest son
of Nifl's royal family would make for a
formidable opponent.$k$pEven after the fall of Nifl... He
infiltrated Múspell and attempted to
assassinate Father, all alone.$k$pHe is a dangerous man.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Not as dangerous as Father.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|No. But if he were to join forces with
Askr, who could say what they might
accomplish together?$k$pGet ready. We will leave soon.$k$p$Sbs150|
